https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null A charismatic teen is thrown into a crisis of life and love when he must decide whether to leave his rapidly gentrifying Brooklyn community to pursue a prestigious academic scholarship. 72 Hours: A Brooklyn Love Story?
